entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is introduced as the person leading the way. He is mentioned in the first sentence of the text.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the person who has walked up several steps and is calling out to Ron and Hermione. He is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as one of the people being called by Harry. He is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of the people being called by Harry. She is also praised by Harry for coming up with a story to protect her from harm. She is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.

entities.name: the wandmaker
entities.description: The Wandmaker is introduced as someone who was hurting Hermione, prompting Harry to come up with a story to protect her. He is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.

relationships.description: Harry helped Hermione by coming up with a story to protect her from harm. This is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.
Harry called out to Ron, asking him and Hermione to join him. This is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.
Harry praised Hermione for coming up with a story to protect her from harm. This is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.
Ron comforted Hermione by giving her a one-armed squeeze. This is mentioned in the second paragraph of the text.
